name: magic-mana-engine
description: Integrates Magic: The Gathering mana system into Foundry Virtual Tabletop

scripts.copy: npm run copy:templates && npm run copy:styles && npm run copy:languages && npm run copy:module-json && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx prettier . --write && npm run copy && esbuild main.mjs --bundle --outfile=dist/main.js --format=esm --sourcemap
scripts.zip: rimraf magic-mana-engine && rimraf magic-mana-engine.zip && cpx "dist/**/*" "magic-mana-engine" && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Compress-Archive -Path 'magic-mana-engine' -DestinationPath 'magic-mana-engine.zip' -Force"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run zip && rimraf magic-mana-engine

author: LoboWerewolf
